name: blog-hugo
description: Henrik's blog using static site engine Hugo

scripts.build: npm run clean:public && hugo version && hugo --gc --minify && npm run index:prod
scripts.start: hugo && npm run index && npm run hugo:watch
scripts.test:install-deps:arch: sudo pacman -S --needed core/nss core/nspr extra/at-spi2-core extra/libcups extra/libdrm core/dbus extra/libxcb extra/libxkbcommon extra/at-spi2-core extra/libx11 extra/libxcomposite extra/libxdamage extra/libxext extra/libxfixes extra/libxrandr extra/mesa extra/pango extra/cairo extra/alsa-lib extra/xorg-server-xvfb
